org.jfree.data.contour
Class DefaultContourDataset

java.lang.Object
  org.jfree.data.general.AbstractDataset
      org.jfree.data.general.AbstractSeriesDataset
          org.jfree.data.xy.AbstractXYDataset
              org.jfree.data.xy.AbstractXYZDataset
                  org.jfree.data.contour.DefaultContourDataset
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, ContourDataset, Dataset, java.util.EventListener, java.io.ObjectInputValidation, java.io.Serializable, SeriesChangeListener, SeriesDataset, XYDataset, XYZDataset
Direct Known Subclasses:
NonGridContourDataset
public class DefaultContourDataset
extends AbstractXYZDataset
implements ContourDataset

A convenience class that provides a default implementation of the ContourDataset interface.

Author:
David M. O'Donnell
See Also:
